title: Spectate mode
body: Anybody know when spectate mode will be enabled in Alpha client? Sometimes i just want to spectate a match but have to switch client

replies.body:
I'm not sure! Feel free to post about this on the [Alpha Client Discussion boards.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
